means: 使活动，起动，触发( activate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He activated the door with the miniature sonic transmitter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用微型声波发射器开启了门。

sentence.Network_en: The virus remains dormant in nerve tissue until activated.
sentence.Network_cn: 病毒潜伏于神经组织里直到被激活。

sentence.Network_en: The burglar alarm is activated by movement.
sentence.Network_cn: 这防盗警报器一动就会响。

entry.def: If a device or process is activated, something causes it to start working.

example.ex: Video cameras with night vision can be activated by movement.
example.tran: 带夜视镜的摄像机一有动静就会启动。

means.word_mean: 1. (of sewage) treated with aeration and bacteria to aid decomposition
2. of e.g. a molecule; made reactive or more reactive
3. rendered active; e.g. rendered radioactive or luminescent or photosensitive or conductive
4. set up and placed on active assignment;

example.en: All four of them went out and got a little activated.
example.zh: 他们四个人者出去了，在外面喝得有点醉了。

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Helwig says he activated the feature last year.

Sentence.sentence: One's brain becomes sharp when it is activated.
